alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 2:25PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Escambia and north central Escambia Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 225 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over I65 And CR 1, or 4 miles north of Atmore, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Atmore, Brewton, Flomaton, McCullough, East Brewton, Pollard, Riverview, I65 And CR 1, I65 And AL 21, Poarch Creek Reservation and I65 And AL 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
